abstract.text: Create tasks for participants to perform.

inlineContent.text: Using ResearchKit, you can build apps that obtain consent, give instructions, present a form or survey, or run an active task. You create all of these interactions with a collection of steps. Steps are based on
and are the building blocks of tasks.

abstract.text: Create apps that securely collect information for research.
Design and create research-centered apps that guide the participant.
Build research apps to collect information.
